text: Richard Arkwright Snelling (February 18, 1927August 13, 1991) was an American businessman and politician. He was the 76th and 78th Governor of Vermont from 1977 to 1985 and from January 10, 1991 until his death. Snelling died of a heart attack at his home in Shelburne, Vermont on August 13, 1991 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Governors of Vermont Category:Businesspeople from Vermont Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Allentown, Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard A. Snelling
